text: فانجينه واهله الا امراته كانت من الغبرين

translations.translation: So We rescued him and his family - except for his wife. She was one of those who stayed behind.
But We saved him and his family, except for his wife who was one of those who stayed behind.
Then We delivered Lot and his household save his wife who stayed behind,
We saved (Lot) and his family except his wife who remained with the rest.
And We rescued him and his family, except his wife – she became of those who stayed behind.
Then We saved him and his family, except his wife; she was of the Ghabirin (those who lagged behind).
So We delivered him and his followers, except his wife; she was of those who remained behind.
So We delivered him and his family, except his wife; she was one of those that tarried.
And We rescued him and his household, save his wife, who was of those who stayed behind.
So We saved him and his family -- except for his wife. She was one of those who stayed behind.
Then We delivered him and his household, save his wife: she was among the lingerers.
Thereupon We delivered him and his family, except his wife; she was one of those who remained behind.
But we saved him and his family, except his wife: she was of those who legged behind.
Then We saved him and his family, except his wife; she was of those who remained behind (in the torment).
We saved him and all his family, except his wife, who was made to remain,
But We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who lagged behind.
So We saved him and his family, except for his wife; she was of those who remained [with the evildoers].
[7:83] So We delivered him and his family, except his wife: she was of those who stayed behind, who remained in the chastisement.
(And We rescued him) i.e. Lot (and his household) his daughters: Za'ura and Raytha, (save his wife, who was of those who stayed behind) and was therefore destroyed.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِلاَّ ٱمْرَأَتَهُ كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَابِرِينَ } معناهُ من الباقينَ
 ويقالُ من الباقينَ فِي عَذابِ الله

translations.translation:
And His saying, "Except for his wife, who was among those who remained behind," means that she was among those who were left behind.


And it is said of those who remain in Allah's punishment

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
أخذناهم بظلمهم وإسرافهم { فَأَنجَيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ } أي: من آمن له مما أصابهم { إِلاَّ ٱمْرَأَتَهُ } لأنها تسر الكفر
 لذلك { كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَابِرِينَ } [الأعراف: 83] الهالكين بقهر الله

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
قال تعالى: { فأنجيناه وأهله } أي: من آمن معه
 { إلا امرأته } فإنها كانت تسر الكفر { كانت من الغابرين } أي: الباقين في ديارهم فهلكوا وهلكت معهم
